text: One of the best bars in the area. The staff is very friendly one of the cleanest places i have been kudos to the owner i will definitely be back.
Did a pit stop here while biking the GAP, beer was super cheap and staff is nice. They allow smoking in the bar, which is not common for us, so we hung out on their patio.
Great place if your on the Great Allegheny Passage bicycling.
